title: Rearranging Digits
text:
Given A and B, how many numbers between A and B (with no leading 0's) rearrange their digits when multiplied by 2?InputThe first line contains the number of test cases T. T lines follow, each containing two integers A and B.OutputOutput T lines, one for each test case containing the desired answer for the corresponding test case.SampleInput:2
1 100
499875921 499875921Output:0
1Constraints1 ≤ T ≤ 100001 ≤ A ≤ B ≤ 10000000000 (1010)
